##Setting Up Libraries
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(fs)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
library(RSQLite)
library(tidyverse)
library(rgdal)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(OpenStreetMap)
library(janitor)
library(terra)
library(raster)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(plotly)
```

##Reading in the Data
```{r}

Gender_Inequality_Data <- read_csv(here::here("hw4_data", "Gender_Inequality_Data.csv")) %>% 
  na.omit() 

world_data <- st_read(here("hw4_data", "World_Countries_(Generalized).geojson"))

```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
